org.soulwing.prospecto.api

Interface ViewContext


  • public interface ViewContext
    A context used when evaluating view template with a model to produce a view.
    Author:
    Carl Harris

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static char PATH_DELIMITER
      Delimiter used in the string representation of a view path

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MutableScope appendScope()
      Creates a new mutable scope appending it to the list of scopes on this context.
      List<Class<?>> currentModelPath()
      Gets the sequence of model types encountered on view nodes of type object and array-of-object that form the model path to the current view node as a template is being evaluated to produce a view.
      List<String> currentViewPath()
      Gets the sequence of view node names that form the path to the current view node as a template is being evaluated to produce a view.
      String currentViewPathAsString()
      Gets the sequence of view node names that form the path to the current view node as a template is being evaluated to produce a view.

      Gets a singleton object of the given type.

      Gets the configuration options associated with this context.

      Removes an object from the current frame of the context stack.

    • Field Detail

      • PATH_DELIMITER

        static final char PATH_DELIMITER
        Delimiter used in the string representation of a view path
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • newScope

        MutableScope newScope()
        Creates a new mutable scope.

        After creation, the caller must add the scope to the context's configured scopes in order for it to be consulted when requesting an object from the context.

        Returns:
        new mutable scope instance

      • appendScope

        MutableScope appendScope()
        Creates a new mutable scope appending it to the list of scopes on this context.
        Returns:
        new mutable scope instance

      • prependScope

        MutableScope prependScope()
        Creates a new mutable scope inserting it at the front of the list of scopes on this context.
        Returns:
        new mutable scope instance

      • getScopes

        Scopes getScopes()
        Gets the collection of scopes that will be consulted when a requested context object is not found in any of the internal scopes managed by the context itself. The scopes are consulted in order until a requested object is found or until all available scopes have been exhausted.

        The returned collection can be manipulated directly to add or remove scopes as needed. Manipulating the list during view generation or view application has no effect on the generation/update in progress.

        Returns:
        scope collection

      • getListeners

        ViewListeners getListeners()
        Gets the collection of listeners associated with this context.

        The returned collection can be manipulated directly to add or remove listeners as needed. Manipulating the collection during view generation or view application has no effect on the generation/update in progress.

        Returns:
        listener collection

      • getValueTypeConverters

        ValueTypeConverters getValueTypeConverters()
        Gets the collection of ValueTypeConverter instances that will be consulted to convert model value types to view value types and vice-versa.

        The collection of converters can be manipulated directly to add (or remove, or reorder) converters as needed. The order of the converters in this list has an effect on converter selection; the first converter in the list that claims support for a given type {via its ValueTypeConverter.supports(Class) method}, will be used to convert all model instances of that type.

        Manipulating the list of converters during view generation or model update has no effect.

        Returns:
        value type converters

      • getReferenceResolvers

        ReferenceResolvers getReferenceResolvers()
        Gets the collection of reference resolvers that will be consulted to resolve reference objects in a view.

        The returned collection can be manipulated directly to add or remove resolvers as needed. Manipulating the collection during view generation or view application has no effect.

        Returns:
        resolver collection

      • getAssociationManagers

        AssociationManagers getAssociationManagers()
        Gets the collection of association managers that will be consulted to manage collections in a view during view applicaiton.

        The returned collection can be manipulated directly to add or remove managers as needed. Manipulating the collection during view generation or view application has no effect.

        Returns:

      • getOptions

        Options getOptions()
        Gets the configuration options associated with this context.

        The returned collection can be manipulated directly to add or remove options as needed. Manipulating the options during view generation or view application has no effect.

        Returns:
        options

      • currentViewPath

        List<String> currentViewPath()
        Gets the sequence of view node names that form the path to the current view node as a template is being evaluated to produce a view.
        Returns:
        sequence of view node names which is empty before visiting the root view node

      • currentViewPathAsString

        String currentViewPathAsString()
        Gets the sequence of view node names that form the path to the current view node as a template is being evaluated to produce a view.
        Returns:
        sequence of view node names joined using the slash ('/') character; the string always begins with a leading slash, and contains no additional name segments before visiting the root view node

      • currentModelPath

        List<Class<?>> currentModelPath()
        Gets the sequence of model types encountered on view nodes of type object and array-of-object that form the model path to the current view node as a template is being evaluated to produce a view.
        Returns:
        sequence of model types which is empty before visiting the root view node

      • get

        <T> T get(Class<T> type)
        Gets a singleton object of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of object to retrieve
        Returns:
        singleton instance of the given type
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if there is no object of the given type
        IllegalStateException - if there is more than one object of the given type

      • getOptional

        <T> T getOptional(Class<T> type)
        Gets a singleton object of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of object to retrieve
        Returns:
        singleton instance of the given type or null if there is no object of the given type
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if there is more than one object of the given type

      • get

        <T> T get(String name,
        Class<T> type)
        Gets a named object of the given type.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the object to retrieve
        type - expected type of the named object
        Returns:
        instance of the given type that corresponds to the given name
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - exception if there is no object with the given name
        ClassCastException - if the object with the given name does not have the expected type

      • getOptional

        <T> T getOptional(String name,
                Class<T> type)
        Gets a named object of the given type.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the object to retrieve
        type - expected type of the named object
        Returns:
        instance of the given type that corresponds to the given name or null if no such instance exists
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - if the object with the given name does not have the expected type

      • put

        void put(Object obj)
        Puts an object into the current frame of the context stack.

        The given value replaces any existing object that is logically equivalent (according to Object.equals(Object)) to obj, including any named object

        Parameters:
        obj - the object to put

      • put

        void put(String name,
       Object obj)
        Puts a named object into the current frame of the context stack.

        The given value replaces any existing object that is logically equivalent (according to Object.equals(Object)) to obj, including any unnamed object

        Parameters:
        name - name of the object
        obj - the object to associate with name

      • putAll

        void putAll(Collection<?> objs)
        Puts all of the objects from the given collection into the current frame of the context stack.
        Parameters:
        objs - the collection of values to put

      • putAll

        void putAll(Map<String,?> objs)
        Puts all of the named objects from the given map into the current frame of the context stack.
        Parameters:
        objs - the map of objects to put

      • remove

        boolean remove(Object value)
        Removes an object from the current frame of the context stack.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to remove
        Returns:
        true if an object matching the identity of value was removed
